CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: These results not only demonstrate that thienyl-substituted anthracene is a very promising building block as an electron - donating unit of low band - gap polymers for high performance PSCs but also PTATDPP can be used as a universal electron donor material compatible with various electron acceptor materials in PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

Sure, I'd be happy to help you identify the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph! Here are the entities I found:

1. Thienyl-substituted anthracene - This is a specific type of organic compound that is mentioned in the paragraph as a promising building block for low band gap polymers.
2. PTATDPP - This is another specific organic compound mentioned in the paragraph as a universal electron donor material that is compatible with various electron acceptor materials in PSCs.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the entities that refer to "Material Name" in the paragraph:

1. Thienyl-substituted anthracene
2. PTATDPP

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities that refer to "Material Name" in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Thienyl-substituted anthracene |
| PTATDPP |
